for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = input()
    s = input()
    if l == s:
        print('YES')
        continue
    l0Count = l.count('0')
    l1Count = l.count('1')
    s0Count = s.count('0')
    s1Count = s.count('1')
    if s0Count > 0 and s1Count > 0:
        print('YES')
        continue
    print('NO')

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    a = input()
    b = input()
    az = a.count('0')
    bz = b.count('0')
    ao = a.count('1')
    bo = b.count('1')
    if az == n and bo == n or (ao == n and bz == n) or (az > 0 and ao > 0 and (bz == n or bo == n)) or (bz > 0 and bo > 0 and (bz == n or bo == n)):
        print('NO')
    else:
        print('YES')

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    S = input()
    P = input()
    set_s = set(S)
    set_p = set(P)
    if len(set_p) == 1 and S != P:
        print('NO')
    else:
        print('YES')

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    p = input()
    a = p.count('1')
    b = p.count('0')
    if a >= 1 and b >= 1 or s == p:
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')

from sys import stdin, stdout
for _ in range(int(stdin.readline())):
    n = int(stdin.readline())
    s = stdin.readline().strip('\n')
    p = stdin.readline().strip('\n')
    a = s.count('0')
    b = n - a
    c = p.count('0')
    d = n - c
    if a == d and a == n or (b == c and c == n) or (a != n and c == n) or (b != n and d == n):
        print('NO')
    else:
        print('YES')

for T in range(int(input())):
    N = int(input())
    S = input()
    P = input()
    A = S.count('1')
    B = S.count('0')
    C = P.count('1')
    D = P.count('0')
    if A == C and B == D or (C > 0 and D > 0):
        print('YES')
    else:
        print('NO')
